analysis_entries.description: A list of individual argument analyses.

username.description: The Reddit username of the commenter.

comment_id.description: The Reddit ID of the comment being analyzed.

comment_summary.description: A brief summary of the comment's argument.

argument_type.description: Classification of the argument in this comment.

fallacy_type.description: The specific name of the fallacy, if 'argument_type' is 'fallacy'. Empty otherwise.

flaw_description.description: Description of the fallacy or weakness, if any. Empty if valid or no argument.

overall_summary.description: A concise overall summary of the argument quality in the entire thread.

overall_argument_type.description: Overall classification of the entire discussion thread.
